title: 求解 linux 里的问题
author: 巅峰丶
txt_content:
[root@xiaodian ~]# screen

[root@xiaodian ~]# cd Pocketmine
[root@xiaodian Pocketmine]# sh PocketMine-MP_Installer_Alpha_1.3.11.sh
[INFO] PocketMine-MP Alpha_1.3.11 downloader & installer for Linux & Mac
[0/2] Cleaning...
[1/2] Downloading PocketMine-MP Alpha_1.3.11...
PocketMine-MP_Installer_Alpha_1.3.11.sh: line 31: wget: command not found

gzip: stdin: unexpected end of file
tar: Child returned status 1
tar: Error is not recoverable: exiting now
[root@xiaodian Pocketmine]# 


怎么办~~~！！！！！

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content: linux是什么？插件吗？如果是就错版了，去联机问答，BYE

replies.txt_content:
